item.title: ggplot2 in a nutshell
item.description: Why this post? Some time ago Dina Pomeranz posted on twitter a brief article about how the gender gaps has been falling in most countries, if you don’t believe me: The unadjusted gender wage gap for full time workers has been falling significantly in most countries: https://t.co/k7olIo40ZA pic.twitter.com/uknetWXajw — Dina D.
